title: My finger sensor and lock unlock key is not working properly. It take long time to switch the scree
content: My finger senser and lock unlock key is not working properly. It take long time to  switch the screen on. Even some time wait for an hour.I am having this issuse since last two month. Im still under my two year plan.I phone start having problem. Is all pixel phone have same issue.i have great hope with pixel three xl but it all turn bad. What should i do. Dont we have warrant or repair option. .
